Boardman Hill Solar Farm (BHSF) bụ ọrụ ugbo anyanwụ nke ọbọdọ 150 kW AC

Ugbo ahụ bụ nke mbụ na-ahụ màkà anyanwụ na Vermont nke na-emezu ọrụ nke Vermont Grown, Vermont Green: ónyé otu zuru oke, njikwa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nkè ọrụ na-aga n'ihu, na ezumike nká nke RECs nke ugbo anyanwụ mepụtara. Ọ dị na Boardman Hill Farm na West Rutland, Vermont.
N'afọ 2015, e nyère BHSF Vermont Energy and Climate Action Network Best Project nkè afọ 2015 Ọ natara Vermont Governor's Environmental Excellence Award n'afọ 2016.
